"A.P.241/10/15/11:30": "Welcome back you two. We suffered minimal damage thanks to your efforts."
"But, Xiao. Those Darkers were..."
"We have collected data from here too... Looking at our data, the energy readings indicate that the Darkers are in fact, being strengthened."
"We have to figure out why..."
"1. They're being influenced from Omega?"
"2. You've figured out a reason?"
"I cannot be certain yet, however that is a possibility we cannot ignore."
"Though I do not understand it yet, I feel I may be on to something."
"It seems it might be due to... influence from Omega?"
"We've calculated a result that linked the Black Hole's expansion with the strengthening of the Darkers."
"I guess when the Black Hole absorbs more worlds, isn't it as if the [Profound Darkness] is consuming them?"
"When we say that the [Profound Darkness] consumes what the Black Hole absorbs, it doesn't sound so far-fetched."
"The [Profound Darkness] corrupts all things, regardless of what nature."
"It only views the things the Black Hole absorbs as food, thus empowering itself every time."
"And when it grows stronger, the Darkers grow stronger as a result..."
"This became a more dire situation than originally thought of."
"The energy being absorbed by the Black Hole is huge. We won't be able to handle it."
"But before that... We first have to deal with Omega."
"The Influence"
"There's This World, There's That World"
